tweet:
Freshman Va. Republican Denver Riggleman is excited to move past impeachment in the New Year.

“I mean, there's a lot to do and I mean, my goodness at some point we got to go for the American people and stop this ridiculousness," Riggleman says.
#VA05 https://www.wvtf.org/post/some-virginia-congressional-leaders-are-beyond-ready-shift-focus-impeachment#stream/0 …

"I think that people are looking for people that have served in business and the military rather than politicians and I think that’s why I am in a good place right now."

#VA05, listen to my interview with Charles Fishburne and VPM News here:

 https://vpm.org/news/articles/9397/in-one-on-one-interview-republican-rep-denver-riggleman-says-he-supports-second … pic.twitter.com/1lvoK6moDB

This is great news for America and #VA05! Virginia exports to Asia were $5.5B with $1.2B to China specifically. This trade deal will grow our economy and help farmers and consumers in Virginia. https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.forbes.com/sites/sergeiklebnikov/2020/12/30/phase-one-us-china-trade-deal-to-be-signed-this-week-report/amp/ …

.@RepLeeZeldin is right. We, as Americans, must confront anti-Semitism head on & crush it—in the United States and globally. Find It, Target It, Remove It. https://twitter.com/RepLeeZeldin/status/1211309467494748162 …

This year has been an exciting an momentous time in Congress and we have secured many great wins for #VA05.  In this week's video address, I reflect on our accomplishments from this year.
Watch here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UsOFbeIiDNs&feature=youtu.be …
To all who celebrate in #VA05 and across the country, #MerryChristmas and #GodBless! May you have a rested and joyful holiday season and a Happy New Year! pic.twitter.com/ozi1Dim80s

Last week I was on @107Wchv with Joe Thomas and we spoke about #impeachment, the #USMCA, and prescription drug pricing.  Listen here, #VA05: https://omny.fm/shows/joe-thomas-in-the-morning/122019-wchvradio-podcast-rep-denver-riggleman-visi …

"We must, above all, support our Purple Star Families and honor their sacrifice. I am proud to author the Purple Star Families Week Act, and urge my colleagues to act upon this legislation immediately.”

 https://riggleman.house.gov/media/press-releases/congressman-riggleman-introduces-bill-honor-veteran-families-bring-attention … pic.twitter.com/e42CmTR12T

#HappyHanukkah to all who celebrate in #VA05 and across the country! May this Festival of Lights bring you hope and warmth
#HanukkahSameach pic.twitter.com/mFovZ4k0A1

#VA05, check out my weekly newsletter for an update on the week in Congress.  https://riggleman.house.gov/media/newsletters/hill-denver-riggleman-weekly-update-december-20-2019 … pic.twitter.com/W323pfhSBe

Trump endorses Riggleman in Virginia House race
#VA05 https://thehill.com/homenews/campaign/475032-trump-endorses-riggleman-in-virginia-house-race …

Finally, the House ratified the #USMCA! The USMCA will create thousands of jobs- rebalancing trade for dairy, cattle, and tobacco farmers, giving them greater access to markets in Canada and Mexico- almost a quarter of Virginia trade.  I will always put #VA05 first

“Thomas Jefferson and James Madison are not around, but I don’t think they would be pleased to see Congress subverting the will of democracy by holding an impeachment vote because the majority party simply cannot accept the 2016 election.” https://www.richmond.com/news/virginia/virginians-in-u-s-house-vote-along-partisan-lines-on/article_121bf39d-a773-559b-b894-663581dbe4de.html …

"I was not elected to take political votes that attempt to overturn the will of the American people.  I ran for office to serve my constituents. Let’s remember, that’s why we are here."
#Impeachment pic.twitter.com/YrpytiqzdZ

"I voted no on both articles of impeachment.  I was not elected to take political votes that attempt to overturn the will of the American people.  I ran for office to serve my constituents. Let’s remember, that’s why we are here." https://riggleman.house.gov/media/press-releases/congressman-denver-riggleman-votes-against-impeachment …
Staff and I trying to grab a quick dinner before votes. 1750 (550PM). It’s been a long day. #IMPEACHMENTVOTE tonight. #USMCA tomorrow. I’m a NO on impeachment pic.twitter.com/HLVCqzP7rm
1645 - Talking to #VA05 constituents in our teletownhall.  Thank you to everyone who called in! pic.twitter.com/EdITfKdmKx

#VA05, my telephone town hall is starting right now.  Details on you you can join in can be found here: https://riggleman.house.gov/media/press-releases/congressman-denver-riggleman-host-telephone-townhall …
Watch my speech from this afternoon on the #impeachment resolution. pic.twitter.com/McOHBB9qVc
Quick coffee and then double-checking  tomorrow’s great #USMCA legislation and preparing for telephone town hall. Busy day. Optimistic about the future pic.twitter.com/2yWbpDYtAh

Back to the floor for a vote to amend the rule and ensure that the House does NOT move forward with articles of impeachment without providing a real, thorough, fair and transparent process.
1050 - Returned to office to read the FISA report, prepare for my floor speech, and monitor the impeachment debate. pic.twitter.com/RrKERBTLUV
Now discussing real time payments and if the Fed should be in the market against private business. And the impact of the USMCA and Phase 1 China trade deal on the economy.

#VA05 This afternoon I will be hosting a special edition telephone townhall at 4pm to discuss the USMCA, Impeachment, and all the topics of concern to you.  
Details on how to call in here: https://riggleman.house.gov/media/press-releases/congressman-denver-riggleman-host-telephone-townhall …

0915 - Voted to adjourn, motion failed.
0940 - Meeting with Chairman of the Federal Reserve Jay Powell
0950 - Procedural vote on Motion to table a Republican resolution
0955 - Rush back to Powell meeting to discuss crypto currencies and other topics

Today I will be tweeting some behind the scenes content on this historic and somber day; a freshman rep's view.

0900 - This morning began with interviews with three news outlets about impeachment and the USMCA

"Democrats have been trying to impeach President Trump since he was elected in 2016 and now, after a politicized and rushed process, are putting impeachment articles to a vote in the House. I strongly oppose this #impeachment effort and will vote NO tomorrow." pic.twitter.com/AxsUT4sA5J
pic.twitter.com/FZD0uVxFPO

“People are looking for somebody who doesn’t look at this as a career, they’re looking for somebody who wants to serve." #VA05 https://www.roanoke.com/news/local/rep-denver-riggleman-is-being-himself/article_fcfb6e6a-bb65-550c-8be5-ffff8885a452.html …

.@GOPLeader is right.  Let's put this impeachment behind us and get back to getting things done for the American people.  Real legislation, not political theatre. https://twitter.com/GOPLeader/status/1205850614212771840 …

This morning the House Judiciary Committee voted to advance articles of #impeachment against @realdonaldtrump with 0 @HouseGOP votes.  
It is now obvious that this process is purely a political sham and the American people will respond to facts not political theater like this.

Passing the National Defense Authorization Act is one of Congress’ most important constitutional duties. I am especially pleased that three sections I authored were included in the final version of the bill, including a provision on North Korean sanctions oversight. https://twitter.com/FinancialCmte/status/1204900520244236288 …

The House of Representatives passed the NDAA last night. Included in this years NDAA are three sections I authored which will will help equip our armed forces with the skills they need and deter our enemies’ threats. https://riggleman.house.gov/media/press-releases/national-defense-authorization-act-including-sections-sponsored-congressman …

Riggleman said said he’ll vote against both impeachment articles offered by Democrats.

He also called the process overly politicized. “No matter where you go on this, it almost seems like it’s shirts and skins, and I think that’s a shame.” https://www.virginiamercury.com/blog-va/spanberger-luria-say-they-arent-part-of-push-to-censure-trump/ …
